Welcome to the hackathon!
 
The survey determined that Data Visualisation and Machine Learning will be the
topics of interest.
 
In year 1 we created static plots and simpler models such as Linear and Logistic
Regressions. 
 
You have been asked to investigate new packages and methodologies and evaluate
their use as an innovative method for your organisation.

You will use the [Ames Housing Data](data/ames.csv) for this task.
